item.title: 0x474E (In)fluent(a)bit
item.description: I’ve moved log collection and telemetry out of GCP Stackdriver (mentioned before) to on-prem InfluxDB (running in a raspberry pi 4 4GB) FluentBit was the agent of choice at the time but Telegraf seemed like a good candidate now. Why fluentd has a lot of plugins but its crappy ruby codebase eats way too many resources for me (why would anyone?) to use it. Luckily, the same guys gave it an extreme makeover in C and called it fluentbit.
